Key.Original: Minimum players until ready (suggest setting same as # of player units).
Key.English: Minimum players until ready (suggest setting same as # of player units)

Key.Original: Time (s) until players are ready, regardless of how many are ready.
Key.English: Time (s) until players are ready, regardless of how many are ready.

Key.Original: Starts the MPSync upon mission start. Will wait for all players in the lobby to be spawned and ready before starting mission.
Key.English: Starts the MPSync upon mission start. Will wait for all players in the lobby to be spawned and ready before starting mission.
